      • updateAllDateFilters

        public static void updateAllDateFilters(ReportSpecificationImpl spec)
        AMP-26444 When switching to ETH-CALENDAR or to GREG-CALENDAR with offsets (m, d), the selected year for date should be updated. We have to update explicitly the dates. E.g.: If in GPI was selected 2009 in ETH-Calendar, we have to update the date filter in Gregorian CAL 2009: "01/01/2009 to 31/12/2009" in ETH Calendar equals to "11/09/2016 to 10/09/2017" in GREG
        Parameters:
        spec -

      • getYearFromDate

        Returns:

      • applyFilterRules

        public static void applyFilterRules(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> filterMap,
                                    ReportSpecificationImpl spec,
                                    java.lang.Integer months)
        Apply filterRules. In case the spec already have filterRules, append them.
        Parameters:
        filterMap - map with all filters
        spec - report specification
        months - if not null then filter by last N months
